title: roundtrip to chicago on thursday evenings (stevensville)
shortDescription: i drive my daugther from stevensville to chicago on thursdays. we leave around 5:00 pm and return around 9:00 pm (we reach to stevensville around 11:00 pm). we have room for up to 3 people to split the cost of gas.
